item.title: Install Python-3 on Ubuntu and PyCharm Community Edition
item.description: https://doruffleton.com/4/7118622 Python is a versatile and widely-used programming language, and Ubuntu is one of the most popular Linux distributions. In this blog post, we will walk you through the process of Installing Python 3 on Ubuntu Setting up PyCharm Community Edition, a powerful Python IDE. Part 1: Installing Python 3 on Ubuntu Step 1: Update Package Lists Before installing Python 3, it’s a good practice to update the package lists to ensure you get the latest information.
